comment: Prof. Marks is a great instructor. She is very understanding and a great resource to use throughout your field experience. Be sure to do the small weekly assignments you are given. All of her assignments relate the the experience in some way and are very easy.

Great professor to take for this course. The most time consuming thing was the field experience, but you have to do this no matter what professor you take. Assignments are laid out and expectations/rubrics are clear. Easy A if you do the work and participate in discussion boards, etc.

I love Professor Marks and she really cares about the teaching profession. There's a discussion every week and only a couple quizzes with a few group projects. Your field experience is the main part of your grade and she is very helpful with arranging this. She was so sweet and always brought us snacks and made class enjoyable. I totally recommend!

I definitely recommend taking her. She is so sweet. There are no exams, 2 quizzes, a few group projects, and weekly discussion posts. She is an easy grader!! She brings snacks here and there, which is very thoughtful of her! Also, you have to complete field experience at a school and complete 15 hours which is relatively easy!
Professor Marks is the best professor I had in my 2nd semester at KSU. The class is very easy, if you do the work you'll get an A. She also brings snacks to give to the class here and there.

i absolutely adored prof. marks! she is such a kind person and a great professor, i highly recommend! she does grade for participation (showing up to class). only two (very easy) quizzes over the semester. disc assignment every week. field experience is required but she's super helpful and always accessible to answer questions! def take mrs. marks!

The best professor I think I could've taken for this course. She struggled with technology a bit and gave students the option to attend online if needed (she complained about it tho). Despite that, very easy, kind, helpful, and I learned a lot about the education system without feeling like it was a task. Def recommend taking her.

Take Prof Marks! Super nice and caring. No test, class is manly discussion post and projects. Book isn't necessarily a must. A couple group activities, nothing you can't handle - I hate group work. Also graded activities that go w/ field experience. I will be looking for her to take future classes with! All actually work is done outside of class.
Good bit of homework, and group discussions in class, but everything is super easy. She cares a lot about her students. She is a very sweet lady, and a solid professor.

Lovely class. Professor Marks is a very understanding professor and lets you use your creativity on assignments. Shes very open minded and rarely gave anything lower than an A. Definitely take her if you can shes so sweet and the class was nice

She is so sweet and is genuine with her class. Her grading is very simple and clear. The class was my first education class and I loved it with her! It's a class where I actually felt comfortable in speaking whatever I felt was right. She even gave us snacks from time to time :)

Professor Marks is one of the most understanding professors I have ever had. There are a lot of class discussions about whatever module we are on. This class is not hard and is not meant to be hard. This is the class you decide weather you want to go forward with education. There is a lot of group work so pick where you sit on the first day wisely.
rating_tags: Accessible outside class--Group projects--Clear grading criteria

comment: Lectures tended to be long, boring, and on topics that don't need that much expansion on. However she gives good feedback on assignments and she is a sweet lady. Do not get the books she tells you to get at the beginning of the semester- I got both and ended up with an 'A' without ever using them.

Amazing women and amazing professor. She is so caring and always willing to help. This is my second class I have taken with her and have received an A in both. There are not many assignments, only a few projects, and no final. She will teach you valuable lessons about being a teacher. I wish I could take her for every EDUC class.
rating_tags: Gives good feedback--Graded by few things--Caring

comment: Professor Marks is such a sweet lady. One of the best professors I've had at KSU. She gives you snacks are makes the material fun and applicable. Take her!!
Beth Marks is my QUEEN. I took EDUC 2110 with her and I'm planning on taking EDUC 2120 with her. She's the best! Definitely take your EDUC classes with her.

Shes amazing. She's so sweet and will work with you if you're having issues. We had an assignment due every Sunday and 1-3 group projects and essays. All super easy work and an easy A if you put in the effort. The best education 2110 class you can take!

Such a genuine person. Assignments were fun and didn't feel like real work, and she truly got to know each of her students. Don't get on her bad side, attend class, and study for the 2-3 in class quizzes and you will be fine! Also befriend the field study teacher she puts you with - that determines if you pass!
rating_tags: Gives good feedback--Skip class? You won't pass.--Caring

comment: Two quizzes (she gives you the answers), one simple paper, 3 online discussion questions, and the field experience. Professor Marks makes this class straight forward and easy.

Mrs. Marks is super fun even though the subject is kind of dry. She only gives 2 quizzes, 3 (easy) papers, 2 group projects, 7 discussion online HW due every Sunday, and the field experience. She always gives out treats in class and doesn't give any hard work. Also, she is a very kind and understanding teacher. She is always there to help you!
Majority of assignments are group projects. She allows for corrections for points back on a lot of assignments . She is very knowledgeable on the content in 2130.

Professor Marks is absolutely wonderful. I am only sad she will not be teaching Education 2120. She was clear about what she expected from us, as well as helped us with anything we needed along the way. She was pretty funny and brought snacks to class quite a few times.

I love Professor Marks. I took Education 2130 with Professor Marks in Italy as a Maymester Study abroad program. She is an Amazing teacher and person. She is truly passionate about what she does and truly prepares you for becoming a teacher. I would recommend taking any class that she teaches. She is truly one of the best at KSU!!!

Super easy class. Lectures are boring because of the material in the class, she will admit that herself. However, she tries to make it fun by having you split off in groups and doing group projects. There are no tests, only group projects and if you do bad she lets you redo it for a better grade. The final was a skit and everybody got an A.

The class is fairly easy just do the simple assignments and you'll do fine. Her lectures are kind of boring because of the topics she has to go over, but she breaks them up with group discussion and provides snacks to help you through them. If you want a professor that really seems to care about you she's you prof.
Very caring professor who will help in anyway. Lecture heavy course but she made it interesting with videos and fun activities! Would definitely meet agahin
I loved Professor Marks. Had her for 2110 and 2130. Would take again!
She's very nice & brings snacks to class alot. This class can feel kind of boring. There are no tests only projects and written assignments. There is alot of group work.
Very nice professor. Was passionate and was willing to work with students. Really cared about the people in her class.

Prof Marks is super fun even though the subject is kind of dry. She only gives 2 quizzes, 3 (easy) papers, 2 group projects, 2 discussion boards, and the field experience. She always gives out treats in class and doesn't give any hard work. Also, she is a very kind and understanding teacher.
rating_tags: Gives good feedback--Participation matters--Clear grading criteria

comment: I enjoyed the work with the students in this class but overall didn't learn much about the profession. Kind of felt like we were thrown into the schools without guidance on what to do. Not a very helpful class
She's not the best teacher, but she's nice and always has treats!

I absolutely love this professor! She made the class super fun and handed out candy and food a lot. She really loves what she does and she's the sweetest lady ever. There are no tests, only two quizzes which she gives the answers to the week before. She is amazing, I would take her again.
She's is by far the best professor I've had. As long as you do the assignments, you will get an A. There are no exams, and she will work with you. I would take her again. YOU WILL NOT REGRET IT!

Beth's class was awesome. We had a group of friends who always goofed off in class and she was glad to see that we were all so present in class. 2110 will do field experience at Osborne High School. Easy grade but Osborne is a rough area. You don't NEED the book. A couple minimal papers, 4 HW, 2 quizzes, and an easy final. TAKE THIS CLASS!
She is extremely friendly and loves giving feedback.

She's knowledgable about middle school education. I wish I would of learned a little more in there because some things we do we're kinda pointless and busy work. It's a group work kind of class. Not a tough grader but need to put in effort.

She wants you to succeed and she will talk to you one on one if she notices you are slipping or missed an assignment. She demands respect but is friendly and likes her subject. She changes things up in class each week so it isn't really boring and as long as you go to class and participate it is in easy grade. Homework takes around 30 min each week

Take her. Easy A for 2110. She is so nice and wants to see every succeed. Her lectures can be a little dull at times but  the work for the class is so  easy you don't even care. You won't regret taking her.
Loved her

This class is an easy A. Mrs. Marks is super nice and helpful. Keep up with online work, show up and participate in discussions, skim over the notes before quizzes and you'll be fine. Enjoyed this class.
Ms. Marks is awesome. She is so sweet and really loves middle school. She is passionate about teaching, and her assignments are really easy.

Ms. Marks is very nice and is fine for a 2110 class.  She seems very caring and is a decent lcturer.  2 quizzes, some online assignments, one paper, an easy group project and one more assignment. Prof is very middle grades focused as she was a middle grades teacher.

Take her! Take her! Take her!  She's awesome!  She breaks up her class period with lectures and activities so you never get bored in there.  She's thorough, covers the material, and reviews with you before a quiz.  Very knowledgable and personable.  Highly recommend!
I love Beth Marks! Had her last semester too, and she's so great! She's really nice and a great teacher. You will get free snacks and love this class. :)
Really easty class just make sure you do the assignments and you will get an A
If you have to take Education, take her. Simple as that. She's great!
Great teacher and easy class. Just listen to her discussions and do you weekly online assignment and you'll get an A. Test are response style so if you know the information your fine. fun class!!

Very good teacher, and very knowledgable about her subject.  Attend class and participate.  She takes note of that and applies it to your grade. Some essays required, but nothing hard.  Very easy to make an A as long as you do not miss any assignments and turn them in on time!

Professor Marks is one of the most humanistic teachers I've ever had. Infinitely understanding, she makes this mandatory class very painless on future educators. Her tests count for a fraction of the overall grade. The Field Experience is key to this class. Complete it, get all of your work done, and you'll get an A.

Mrs Marks is a sweet lady. She does'nt take attendance but go to class. You have 2 tests which she calls a quiz Mid & Final they're both only 5 questions. All the Q's come directly from the worksheets. Class normally goes by quickly & she has a couple days set aside that you do not have to go to class just complete a online assign. Take her Easy A!
She is a very nice lady. She is flexible about her due dates. She showed a few movies...overall it was an easy A.
Ms. Marks doesn't explain assignments at all and I am often confused about what is expected of me.

Mrs. Marks is a wonderful teacher, extremely qualified. As long as you attend class and do the work you will do fine. (remember there are thirty hours of outside observation for this class, so if you have a full time job and other classes it gets a little hard to juggle)

Extremely easy! Just make sure that you complete all assignments and listen in class. Her tests come directly from class discussions... I never read the book. Just do your work (which isn't much) and you will get an A.

Took her for 2201 & 2202. Literally the best teacher I have ever had at this school. She is compassionate, well organized, never boring, and knows her subject matter well. She follows the syllabus and grades very fairly. I would recommend her hands down.
Gives clear instructions on assignments.  Teaches the material.  Never boring.  Few group presentations, but a lot of group work and group discussion.
good teacher will work with your schelude if you cannot always make the classes or go to the assigned school.
She is sooo awesome! tries very hard to make the material interesting. is very understanding. the work load is fairly light and manageable.

She was a great teacher!  She made the information fun and interesting.  Tough in different styles.  There was always an interesting project or discussion.  I really enjoyed this class and would highly recommend her!

She's very sweet and understanding...she follows the syllabus closely and although there are a lot of assignments, she gives you plenty of time in class to do them. She also gives a lot of days off and lets you do online assignments instead.
